message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, it is worth $1200000 to us. Considering its significance to you, we are offering it to you at a special price of $950000. This represents a significant saving of $250000 compared to our standard pricing, making it an attractive proposition for someone like yourself who appreciates the true worth of this product. We believe this offer presents a unique chance for you to secure a valuable asset at an advantageous rate. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
